verses.verse: וַיְהִ֕י <WH1961> came כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> after יָשַׁ֥ב <WH3427> sat דָּוִ֖יד <WH1732> Now it came to pass as David בְּבֵית֑וֹ <WH1004> in his house וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said דָּוִ֜יד <WH1732> that David אֶל־ <WH413> to נָתָ֣ן <WH5416> to Nathan הַנָּבִ֗יא <WH5030> the prophet הִנֵּ֨ה <WH2009> Behold אָנֹכִ֤י <WH595> I יוֹשֵׁב֙ <WH3427> Lo I dwell בְּבֵ֣ית <WH1004> in an house הָֽאֲרָזִ֔ים <WH729> made of cedar וַאֲר֥וֹן <WH727> but the ark בְּרִית־ <WH1285> of the covenant יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD תַּ֥חַת <WH8478> is under יְרִיעֽוֹת׃ <WH3407> [remaineth] under curtains

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said נָתָן֙ <WH5416> Then Nathan אֶל־ <WH413> to דָּוִ֔יד <WH1732> unto David כֹּ֛ל <WH3605> all אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> is in בִּֽלְבָבְךָ֖ <WH3824> all that [is] in thine heart עֲשֵׂ֑ה <WH6213> Do כִּ֥י <WH3588> for הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> for God עִמָּֽךְ׃ <WH5973> with ס

וַֽיְהִ֖י <WH1961> came בַּלַּ֣יְלָה <WH3915> And it came to pass the same night הַה֑וּא <WH1931> the same וַיְהִי֙ <WH1961> came דְּבַר־ <WH1697> that the word אֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> of God אֶל־ <WH413> to נָתָ֖ן <WH5416> came to Nathan לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

לֵ֤ךְ <WH1980> Go וְאָמַרְתָּ֙ <WH559> and tell אֶל־ <WH413> about דָּוִ֣יד <WH1732> David עַבְדִּ֔י <WH5650> my servant כֹּ֖ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD לֹ֥א <WH3808> not אַתָּ֛ה <WH859> you תִּבְנֶה־ <WH1129> Thou shalt not build לִּ֥י הַבַּ֖יִת <WH1004> me an house לָשָֽׁבֶת׃ <WH3427> to dwell in

כִּ֣י <WH3588> for לֹ֤א <WH3808> have not יָשַׁ֙בְתִּי֙ <WH3427> For I have not dwelt in בְּבַ֔יִת <WH1004> an house מִן־ <WH4480> since הַיּ֗וֹם <WH3117> since the day אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> i הֶעֱלֵ֙יתִי֙ <WH5927> that I brought up אֶת־ <WH853> יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Israel עַ֖ד <WH5704> against הַיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> unto this day הַזֶּ֑ה <WH2088> to this וָֽאֶהְיֶ֛ה <WH1961> have gone מֵאֹ֥הֶל <WH168> but have gone from tent אֶל־ <WH413> to אֹ֖הֶל <WH168> to tent וּמִמִּשְׁכָּֽן׃ <WH4908> and from [one] tabernacle

בְּכֹ֥ל <WH3605> all אֲשֶֽׁר־ <WH834> where הִתְהַלַּכְתִּי֮ <WH1980> Wheresoever I have walked בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all יִשְׂרָאֵל֒ <WH3478> with all Israel הֲדָבָ֣ר <WH1697> I a word דִּבַּ֗רְתִּי <WH1696> spake אֶת־ <WH854> with אַחַד֙ <WH259> to any שֹׁפְטֵ֣י <WH8199> of the judges יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> whom צִוִּ֛יתִי <WH6680> whom I commanded לִרְע֥וֹת <WH7462> to feed אֶת־ <WH853> עַמִּ֖י <WH5971> my people לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying לָ֛מָּה <WH4100> Why לֹא־ <WH3808> not בְנִיתֶ֥ם <WH1129> Why have ye not built לִ֖י בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> me an house אֲרָזִֽים׃ <WH729> made of cedar

וְ֠עַתָּה <WH6258> Now כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> thus תֹאמַ֞ר <WH559> Now therefore thus shalt thou say לְעַבְדִּ֣י <WH5650> unto my servant לְדָוִ֗יד <WH1732> David ס כֹּ֤ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַר֙ <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD צְבָא֔וֹת <WH6635> of hosts אֲנִ֤י <WH589> I לְקַחְתִּ֙יךָ֙ <WH3947> I took מִן־ <WH4480> from הַנָּוֶ֔ה <WH5116> thee from the sheepcote מִֽן־ <WH4480> from אַחֲרֵ֖י <WH310> [even] from following הַצֹּ֑אן <WH6629> the sheep לִהְי֣וֹת <WH1961> become נָגִ֔יד <WH5057> that thou shouldest be ruler עַ֖ל <WH5921> over עַמִּ֥י <WH5971> over my people יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> Israel

וָֽאֶהְיֶ֣ה <WH1961> have been עִמְּךָ֗ <WH5973> with בְּכֹל֙ <WH3605> all אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who הָלַ֔כְתָּ <WH1980> And I have been with thee whithersoever thou hast walked וָאַכְרִ֥ית <WH3772> and have cut off אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all אוֹיְבֶ֖יךָ <WH341> all thine enemies מִפָּנֶ֑יךָ <WH6440> from before וְעָשִׂ֤יתִֽי <WH6213> thee and have made לְךָ֙ שֵׁ֔ם <WH8034> thee a name כְּשֵׁ֥ם <WH8034> like the name הַגְּדוֹלִ֖ים <WH1419> of the great men אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who בָּאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> that [are] in the earth

וְשַׂמְתִּ֣י <WH7760> Also I will ordain מָ֠קוֹם <WH4725> a place לְעַמִּ֨י <WH5971> for my people יִשְׂרָאֵ֤ל <WH3478> Israel וּנְטַעְתִּ֙יהוּ֙ <WH5193> and will plant וְשָׁכַ֣ן <WH7931> them and they shall dwell תַּחְתָּ֔יו <WH8478> place וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> not יִרְגַּ֖ז <WH7264> in their place and shall be moved ע֑וֹד <WH5750> again וְלֹא־ <WH3808> not יוֹסִ֤יפוּ <WH3254> them any more בְנֵי־ <WH1121> no more neither shall the children עַוְלָה֙ <WH5766> of wickedness לְבַלֹּת֔וֹ <WH1086> waste כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> as בָּרִאשׁוֹנָֽה׃ <WH7223> as at the beginning

וּלְמִיָּמִ֗ים <WH3117> And since the time אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> i צִוִּ֤יתִי <WH6680> that I commanded שֹֽׁפְטִים֙ <WH8199> judges עַל־ <WH5921> over עַמִּ֣י <WH5971> [to be] over my people יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Israel וְהִכְנַ֖עְתִּי <WH3665> Moreover I will subdue אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all אוֹיְבֶ֑יךָ <WH341> all thine enemies וָאַגִּ֣ד <WH5046> Furthermore I tell לָ֔ךְ וּבַ֖יִת <WH1004> thee an house יִֽבְנֶה־ <WH1129> will build לְּךָ֥ יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> thee that the LORD

וְהָיָ֗ה <WH1961> become כִּֽי־ <WH3588> When מָלְא֤וּ <WH4390> be expired יָמֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH3117> And it shall come to pass when thy days לָלֶ֣כֶת <WH1980> go עִם־ <WH5973> with אֲבֹתֶ֔יךָ <WH1> [to be] with thy fathers וַהֲקִֽימוֹתִ֤י <WH6965> that I will raise up אֶֽת־ <WH853> זַרְעֲךָ֙ <WH2233> thy seed אַחֲרֶ֔יךָ <WH310> after אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who יִהְיֶ֖ה <WH1961> will be of מִבָּנֶ֑יךָ <WH1121> thee which shall be of thy sons וַהֲכִינוֹתִ֖י <WH3559> and I will establish אֶת־ <WH853> מַלְכוּתֽוֹ׃ <WH4438> his kingdom

ה֥וּא <WH1931> He יִבְנֶה־ <WH1129> He shall build לִּ֖י בָּ֑יִת <WH1004> me an house וְכֹנַנְתִּ֥י <WH3559> and I will stablish אֶת־ <WH853> כִּסְא֖וֹ <WH3678> his throne עַד־ <WH5704> for עוֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> ever

אֲנִי֙ <WH589> I אֶֽהְיֶה־ <WH1961> become לּ֣וֹ לְאָ֔ב <WH1> I will be his father וְה֖וּא <WH1931> he יִֽהְיֶה־ <WH1961> become לִּ֣י לְבֵ֑ן <WH1121> and he shall be my son וְחַסְדִּי֙ <WH2617> my mercy לֹא־ <WH3808> and I will not אָסִ֣יר <WH5493> away מֵֽעִמּ֔וֹ <WH5973> with כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who הֲסִיר֔וֹתִי <WH5493> from him as I took מֵאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who הָיָ֖ה <WH1961> become לְפָנֶֽיךָ׃ <WH6440> [it] from [him] that was before

וְהַֽעֲמַדְתִּ֛יהוּ <WH5975> But I will settle בְּבֵיתִ֥י <WH1004> him in mine house וּבְמַלְכוּתִ֖י <WH4438> and in my kingdom עַד־ <WH5704> for הָעוֹלָ֑ם <WH5769> for ever וְכִסְא֕וֹ <WH3678> and his throne יִהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> become נָכ֖וֹן <WH3559> shall be established עַד־ <WH5704> against עוֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> evermore

כְּכֹל֙ <WH3605> to all הַדְּבָרִ֣ים <WH1697> According to all these words הָאֵ֔לֶּה <WH428> these וּכְכֹ֖ל <WH3605> to all הֶחָז֣וֹן <WH2377> and according to all this vision הַזֶּ֑ה <WH2088> this כֵּ֛ן <WH3651> so דִּבֶּ֥ר <WH1696> speak נָתָ֖ן <WH5416> so did Nathan אֶל־ <WH413> to דָּוִֽיד׃ <WH1732> unto David פ

וַיָּבֹא֙ <WH935> came הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> the king דָּוִ֔יד <WH1732> And David וַיֵּ֖שֶׁב <WH3427> and sat לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> and said מִֽי־ <WH4310> Who אֲנִ֞י <WH589> I יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> Who [am] I O LORD אֱלֹהִים֙ <WH430> God וּמִ֣י <WH4310> and what בֵיתִ֔י <WH1004> and what [is] mine house כִּ֥י <WH3588> that הֲבִיאֹתַ֖נִי <WH935> that thou hast brought עַד־ <WH5704> against הֲלֹֽם׃ <WH1988> this

וַתִּקְטַ֨ן <WH6994> And [yet] this was a small thing זֹ֤את <WH2063> in בְּעֵינֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH5869> in thine eyes אֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> O God וַתְּדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> for thou hast [also] spoken עַל־ <WH5921> and בֵּֽית־ <WH1004> house עַבְדְּךָ֖ <WH5650> of thy servant's לְמֵרָח֑וֹק <WH7350> for a great while to come וּרְאִיתַ֗נִי <WH7200> and hast regarded כְּת֧וֹר <WH8448> me according to the estate הָאָדָ֛ם <WH120> of a man הַֽמַּעֲלָ֖ה <WH4609> of high degree יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> O LORD אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> God

מַה־ <WH4100> What יּוֹסִ֨יף <WH3254> [speak] more ע֥וֹד <WH5750> still דָּוִ֛יד <WH1732> David אֵלֶ֖יךָ <WH413> to לְכָב֣וֹד <WH3519> to thee for the honour אֶת־ <WH853> עַבְדֶּ֑ךָ <WH5650> thy servant וְאַתָּ֖ה <WH859> you אֶֽת־ <WH853> עַבְדְּךָ֥ <WH5650> your servant יָדָֽעְתָּ׃ <WH3045> acknowledge

יְהוָ֕ה <WH3068> O LORD בַּעֲב֤וּר <WH5668> sake עַבְדְּךָ֙ <WH5650> for thy servant's וּֽכְלִבְּךָ֔ <WH3820> sake and according to thine own heart עָשִׂ֕יתָ <WH6213> hast thou done אֵ֥ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַגְּדוּלָּ֖ה <WH1420> all this greatness הַזֹּ֑את <WH2063> likewise לְהֹדִ֖יעַ <WH3045> in making known אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַגְּדֻלּֽוֹת׃ <WH1420> all [these] great things

יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> O LORD אֵ֣ין <WH369> there כָּמ֔וֹךָ <WH3644> like וְאֵ֥ין <WH369> is none אֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> [there is] none like thee neither [is there any] God זוּלָתֶ֑ךָ <WH2108> beside בְּכֹ֥ל <WH3605> to all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> we שָׁמַ֖עְנוּ <WH8085> thee according to all that we have heard בְּאָזְנֵֽינוּ׃ <WH241> with our ears

וּמִי֙ <WH4310> and what כְּעַמְּךָ֣ <WH5971> [is] like thy people יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Israel גּ֥וֹי <WH1471> nation אֶחָ֖ד <WH259> And what one בָּאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> in the earth אֲשֶׁר֩ <WH834> whom הָלַ֨ךְ <WH1980> went הָאֱלֹהִ֜ים <WH430> whom God לִפְדּ֧וֹת <WH6299> to redeem ל֣וֹ עָ֗ם <WH5971> [to be] his own people לָשׂ֤וּם <WH7760> to make לְךָ֙ שֵׁ֚ם <WH8034> thee a name גְּדֻלּ֣וֹת <WH1420> of greatness וְנֹרָא֔וֹת <WH3372> and terribleness לְגָרֵ֗שׁ <WH1644> by driving out מִפְּנֵ֧י <WH6440> from before עַמְּךָ֛ <WH5971> thy people אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> whom פָּדִ֥יתָ <WH6299> whom thou hast redeemed מִמִּצְרַ֖יִם <WH4714> Egypt גּוֹיִֽם׃ <WH1471> nations

וַ֠תִּתֵּן <WH5414> didst thou make אֶת־ <WH853> עַמְּךָ֨ <WH5971> For thy people יִשְׂרָאֵ֧ל ׀ <WH3478> Israel לְךָ֛ לְעָ֖ם <WH5971> thine own people עַד־ <WH5704> for עוֹלָ֑ם <WH5769> ever וְאַתָּ֣ה <WH859> O יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> and thou LORD הָיִ֥יתָ <WH1961> became לָהֶ֖ם לֵאלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> becamest their God

וְעַתָּ֣ה <WH6258> Now יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Therefore now LORD הַדָּבָ֗ר <WH1697> let the thing אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> you דִּבַּ֤רְתָּ <WH1696> that thou hast spoken עַֽל־ <WH5921> concerning עַבְדְּךָ֙ <WH5650> concerning thy servant וְעַל־ <WH5921> and concerning בֵּית֔וֹ <WH1004> and concerning his house יֵאָמֵ֖ן <WH539> be established עַד־ <WH5704> for עוֹלָ֑ם <WH5769> ever וַעֲשֵׂ֖ה <WH6213> and do כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> you דִּבַּֽרְתָּ׃ <WH1696> as thou hast said

וְ֠יֵֽאָמֵן <WH539> Let it even be established וְיִגְדַּ֨ל <WH1431> may be magnified שִׁמְךָ֤ <WH8034> that thy name עַד־ <WH5704> for עוֹלָם֙ <WH5769> ever לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> saying יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> The LORD צְבָאוֹת֙ <WH6635> of hosts אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> [is] the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel אֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> [even] a God לְיִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> to Israel וּבֵית־ <WH1004> and [let] the house דָּוִ֥יד <WH1732> of David עַבְדְּךָ֖ <WH5650> thy servant נָכ֥וֹן <WH3559> [be] established לְפָנֶֽיךָ׃ <WH6440> before
